attributes.action: recognise fibromyalgia as a disability and scrap the prescription charges
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
fibromyalgia is a debilitating condition that is not yet recognised as a disability,yet the job centre staff say "oh you are classed as disabled but not officially". if this is true then why are we treated differently to other people with disabling conditions.
we get through so many prescriptions per year it is ridiculous and people sometimes have to go without required medication as they may not be able to afford it.
